definition: really/as expected/sure enough/if indeed.../if it's really...

sentences.english: Sure enough, I found her name in the phone book.
sentences.chinese: 果真，我在電話簿上找到了她的名字。

sentences.english: If so, you've got a powder keg.
sentences.chinese: 倘若果真如此，這個人就像一個正在形成的火藥桶。

sentences.english: Twelve years later, she did, becoming the boxer’s fourth wife.
sentences.chinese: 十二年後，她果真如願成爲拳王的第四任妻子。

sentences.english: Tiitinen can rightly claim to be a visionary.
sentences.chinese: 若果真如此，那蒂蒂寧真可以說是位有遠見的人。

sentences.english: OK, I'm being silly.Or am I?
sentences.chinese: 好吧，我這是在說傻話，果真如此嗎？

sentences.english: If my children are silly I must hope to be always sensible of it.
sentences.chinese: 要是我自己的孩子果真蠢，我決不願意沒有自知之明。

sentences.english: Since those pigeons always followed their leader's orders, they fasted willingly.
sentences.chinese: 五百隻鳥向來都是聽從鳥王的命令，果真乖乖地禁食。

sentences.english: However, shandong character was indeed the perfect?
sentences.chinese: 但是山東人的性格果真圓滿嗎？

sentences.english: Are there any future outlook on our city?
sentences.chinese: 我們的城市果真還會有‘對未來的展望’嗎？

sentences.english: The nightmare is really effective, some people die a violent death mystically, some people are murdered strangely.
sentences.chinese: 噩夢果真靈驗，有人神祕暴斃，有人離奇遇害。

sentences.english: In recent years, energy saving policy was really effective or energy consumption was underreported.
sentences.chinese: 近幾年，節能政策果真見效，或能耗被低報。

sentences.english: Later, he came to the office and purchased a copy of Zhuan Falun.
sentences.chinese: 後來，他果真來辦公室請了《轉法輪》。

sentences.english: Fashion e-commerce case prosperity, is golden in the future?
sentences.chinese: 服裝電子商務果真如此繁榮，前途似錦？

sentences.english: But is the web really killing journalism?
sentences.chinese: 但是果真是網絡謀殺了新聞業嗎？

sentences.english: I looked at my watch. It was true.
sentences.chinese: 我看了一下我的手錶，果真如此。

definition: to be worthy of/to deserve to be called/to prove oneself to be
lit. name is not in vain (idiom); a fully justified reputation/enjoys a well-deserved reputation
indeed/truly/(coll.) (used to express disapproval, annoyance etc about sth)
can it be possible that/could it be
unexpectedly/to one's surprise/in spite of everything/in that crazy way/actually/to go as far as to
unexpectedly/to one's surprise/go so far as to
